CONNECTICUT SCHOOL SHOOTING

In Conn., Obama vows to
try to stem further violence

President Obama, speaking on Sunday to mourners at Newtown High School, said he would use the "power this office holds” to prevent mass shootings like Friday's, which left 26 people dead, including 20 small children. (Globe)

On The Blogs

boston spirit

Queer Renaissance in Lynn

After years of disrepair, the 2100-seat Lynn Memorial Auditorium was reopened in 2006 following a full refurbishing. It now hosts major talent on both the local — Boston’s Gay Men’s Chorus — and national scale.
